text: "La La La" is a 2013 song by British record producer Naughty Boy and featuring vocals from English singer Sam Smith. It is the second single from Naughty Boy's debut album Hotel Cabana (2013) and also appears on the deluxe version of Smith's debut album In the Lonely Hour (2014). It topped the single charts in the Czech Republic, Greece, Italy, Lebanon, Romania and the United Kingdom. It went to the top 5 in Australia, Austria, Belgium, Denmark, Finland, Germany, Greece, Ireland, Israel, Luxembourg, the Netherlands, New Zealand, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Scotland, Slovakia, Spain and Switzerland. It also peaked at number 19 in the United States and number 43 in Canada. == References == Category:2013 songs Category:Sam Smith songs
title: La La La (Naughty Boy song)
